title: Revision Technique-Based Elementary Writing Instruction Pedagogy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory understanding and lack of writing instruction experience
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to learn immediately applicable writing instruction strategies in elementary education, incorporating interaction via online discussion boards, video lectures, and LMS assignment submission systems.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain the three-stage approach (planning-feedback-revision) for systematically guiding elementary learners' writing revision process.
Learners will be able to comparatively analyze the differences between reader-centered and writer-centered revision strategies through specific classroom case studies.
Learners will be able to develop guidelines for designing writing feedback activities using peer assessment systems in an LMS environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
